rows.label: bf10240100_0010
rows.name:
You have seen the plain called
Mors, have you not?

rows.label: bf10240100_0020
rows.name: That is what remains of my world.

rows.label: bf10240100_0030
rows.name:
When I opened the Conduit,
many people and many things...

rows.label: bf10240100_0040
rows.name: disappeared, into distant dimensions.

rows.label: bf10240100_0050
rows.name: All that remained here were the ruins of Mors...

rows.label: bf10240100_0060
rows.name: and half of my body.

rows.label: bf10240100_0070
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]!

rows.label: bf10240100_0080
rows.name: Your...body...

rows.label: bf10240100_0090
rows.name: Half of me lives on in some other dimension.

rows.label: bf10240100_0100
rows.name: But...not for much longer.

rows.label: bf10240100_0110
rows.name: What do you mean?

rows.label: bf10240100_0120
rows.name:
The moment of my other self's
demise draws near.

rows.label: bf10240100_0130
rows.name: Father, you...

rows.label: bf10240100_0140
rows.name: I was a fool.

rows.label: bf10240100_0150
rows.name: Because of my foolishness, I lost everything.

rows.label: bf10240100_0160
rows.name:
Left here, alone and broken, I longed for oblivion...
But even that eluded me.

rows.label: bf10240100_0170
rows.name: This is my punishment...

rows.label: bf10240100_0180
rows.name: Punishment from God, for my sin.

rows.label: bf10240100_0190
rows.name: God...?

rows.label: bf10240100_0200
rows.name: There was only one thing I could do...

rows.label: bf10240100_0210
rows.name: I had to atone for my sin.

rows.label: bf10240100_0220
rows.name: I swore to restore this world.

rows.label: bf10240100_0230
rows.name: The first thing I created...

rows.label: bf10240100_0240
rows.name:
was a special particulate substance with
the ability to restore deteriorated matter.

rows.label: bf10240100_0250
rows.name: You all know it as the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: bf10240100_0260
rows.name:
The Cloud Sea can disassemble
matter it comes in contact with,

rows.label: bf10240100_0270
rows.name:
and rebuild it in the image of all the things
that once made up this world.

rows.label: bf10240100_0290
rows.name:
This way, little by little I could rebuild
the world I had brought to ruin...

rows.label: bf10240100_0300
rows.name: Next, I began to recreate life.

rows.label: bf10240100_0310
rows.name:
I gathered miniature vessels containing memories
of all this planet's former lifeforms,

rows.label: bf10240100_0320
rows.name:
and I scattered them across the Cloud Sea.
These are the Core Crystals.

rows.label: bf10240100_0330
rows.name:
The Crystals bonded with the Cloud Sea's
particulate reconstructors...

rows.label: bf10240100_0340
rows.name: and formed the nuclei of new life.

rows.label: bf10240100_0350
rows.name: Those nuclei developed into minute lifeforms-

rows.label: bf10240100_0360
rows.name:
the Divine Beasts-who would over time 
grow larger and larger.

rows.label: bf10240100_0370
rows.name: Finally, the Divine Beasts gave birth

rows.label: bf10240100_0380
rows.name:
to complex organisms, based on the
data in their Core Crystals.

rows.label: bf10240100_0390
rows.name: This newly-birthed life, over untold millennia...

rows.label: bf10240100_0400
rows.name: evolved into a new breed of mankind.

rows.label: bf10240100_0410
rows.name: So that's how we came to live in this world...

rows.label: bf10240100_0420
rows.name:
But I did not trust this world,
born as it had been.

rows.label: bf10240100_0430
rows.name: What if it were to repeat our mistakes?

rows.label: bf10240100_0440
rows.name: What if someone like me appeared?

rows.label: bf10240100_0450
rows.name:
To stave off these doubts,
I implemented one final measure.

rows.label: bf10240100_0460
rows.name: And so the Blades were born.

rows.label: bf10240100_0470
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Ah!

rows.label: bf10240100_0480
rows.name: Ousia, Logos and Pneuma...

rows.label: bf10240100_0490
rows.name:
the three cores of the Trinity Processor 
formed their cornerstone.

rows.label: bf10240100_0500
rows.name:
However... Ousia triggered a space-time
transition event, and disappeared forever.

rows.label: bf10240100_0510
rows.name:
I was left with the other two, Logos and Pneuma,
entrusting them with managing the Blades.

rows.label: bf10240100_0520
rows.name: Metsu and Homura...

rows.label: bf10240100_0530
rows.name: Those are the names that you now know them under.

rows.label: bf10240100_0540
rows.name: So, I am... Pneuma...

rows.label: bf10240100_0550
rows.name: 'Managing'?

rows.label: bf10240100_0560
rows.name: The Core Crystals at the heart of each Blade

rows.label: bf10240100_0570
rows.name:
are tasked with relaying all kinds of
information to Logos and Pneuma...

rows.label: bf10240100_0580
rows.name:
About the selection pressures of the outside world,
and the biological status of their bonded human,

rows.label: bf10240100_0590
rows.name: but also the experiences and emotions they share.

rows.label: bf10240100_0600
rows.name: As the data continually accrues...

rows.label: bf10240100_0610
rows.name:
new evolutionary code is sent back
to the Core Crystals,

rows.label: bf10240100_0620
rows.name:
and this code is used to create
new, further evolved Blades.

rows.label: bf10240100_0630
rows.name: These Blades too become Divine Beasts, in time,

rows.label: bf10240100_0640
rows.name: and create new generations of lifeforms...

rows.label: bf10240100_0650
rows.name: This was the new circle of life I had created.

rows.label: bf10240100_0660
rows.name: A grand scheme...

rows.label: bf10240100_0670
rows.name: It boggles the mind a tad.

rows.label: bf10240100_0680
rows.name:
So we were all born from
this endless cycle of life...

rows.label: bf10240100_0690
rows.name: To replace the victims of the previous world.

rows.label: bf10240100_0700
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: bf10240100_0710
rows.name: But there were also a handful of survivors.

rows.label: bf10240100_0720
rows.name: I believe you saw them when you were in Mors.

rows.label: bf10240100_0730
rows.name: The unfortunate ones who clung to life...

rows.label: bf10240100_0740
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Ahh...!

rows.label: bf10240100_0750
rows.name:
You mean those monsters...
Were they...originally people?

rows.label: bf10240100_0760
rows.name:
Core Crystals were first conceived as
a replacement for human brain cells.

rows.label: bf10240100_0780
rows.name: A product of mankind's age-old quest for immortality.

rows.label: bf10240100_0790
rows.name: And that's what became of them...? How awful.

rows.label: bf10240100_0800
rows.name:
But that technology became the starting point
for the creation of Blades and Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf10240100_0810
rows.name: So in one sense, their sacrifice was not in vain...

rows.label: bf10240100_0820
rows.name: Though not all may see it as such.

rows.label: bf10240100_0830
rows.name: So, tell us. In the end...

rows.label: bf10240100_0840
rows.name: Did we develop as you had hoped?

rows.label: bf10240100_0850
rows.name: What do you think?

rows.label: bf10240100_0860
rows.name: I...couldn't possibly...

rows.label: bf10240100_0870
rows.name:
Well...
Those phantasms which you all experienced earlier...

rows.label: bf10240100_0880
rows.name: Those are feelings that lurk in all of your hearts.

rows.label: bf10240100_0890
rows.name: ...As well as that man, Marveni's...
